verbs.description: Kim Jong - un and Moon Jae - in [V: have] taken a step towards a new future for their respective countries . The fates of their countries – and the legacy of Donald Trump – hang in the balance .

[ARG0: Kim Jong - un and Moon Jae - in] have [V: taken] [ARG1: a step towards a new future for their respective countries] . The fates of their countries – and the legacy of Donald Trump – hang in the balance .
